data.text: Nà-nuɓusɛlai pɛ ge Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI maamusɛ!
È ɓɔɠɔ maaɠiliʋɛ ga wozakalagi eɠɛ seɠei.
È è-zeizuʋɛ loni geezuʋɛ ziɛiti maazuʋɛ,
È fiilɛi ɠɛ ga ɗa-ɠeelai,
È eteai loni ma wuulaagiti maazu kpaan,
È maaɓɔleni ga kpoloɗɛi, eɠɛ seɠei,
Siɛgi zu è zelii loni da ziɛiti ma, ti ʋelani,
ti lɛɛni gizeiti ma, ti yei nɛmɛiti su,
È ziɛiti kwɛgi laaʋɛ, nii ti la ɓudɛa maazu eyɛsu pɛ,
Ɗa ɠa è ziɛungiti ma ɗɛiti zeizu pɛtugiti su,
Miná ɠa dɔɓɔ zuaiti kpein ta ɗa ʋa, ti ɓɔɔle ná,
Wɔniiti ti laɠagiti to ná ɠobaʋɛ,
È-zeizuʋɛ geezuʋɛ, miná ɠa è tonai zeɠezu ná, é ʋu gizeiti ma,
Ɗa ɠa è tufai ʋɔnɔsu toganiiti bɛ, ta siinziin ganigiti nuiti ti botii ɠɛɛzu ga tiye.
ga dɔɔi nii é nuiti koozunɛɛzu,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-guluiti ta ziɛi zɔlɔɔsu ga pagɔ,
Wɔni goiti ta ʋaazu ti laɠagi lo ti zu,
Dɔɓɔ woliiti ta ɗa ɠɛ gize ɠaaɠoozagiti ma,
Ɗa ɠa è alugi ɓɛtɛa, é ɗa yeeɠɛɠalaiti dɛɛ,
Ɗa ʋaazu ga kpidii, wɛlɛ kuai ɠa,
zala ɓokpagiti ta ɗa zikɔ niina ta-laamianigiti polu,
Siɛgi zu foloi ɠulazu la, ta ɗa ɠaaɠale ma,
Nui ɠa ɗa ɠula, é li ná-tii ɠɛɛzuʋɛ,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɗa-ɠɛɛwotiiti wola mɔinʋɛ!
Kpoloɗɛ wolai ʋɛtɛ, nu la kpela kaa,
ɓatoiti ti ɗa ziɛ ga,
Fuluanii naati kpein kitogɛ ɗa nɔ è ʋa,
Ɗa feena ti ya, ta ɗa seɠe,
Kɛlɛ ɗa ʋoluavena ti ʋa, ti zasu ɠa ɗa ɓali,
Ɗa ɗa-viilɛi leʋena, ta ɓɛtɛ,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-lɛbiyai yɛ ná ɠɔ!
A ɠaazulona eteai ʋa, zooi ɠa ɓali,
Nà pɔ gè ɗa guyei loo Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ, nà-eteai pɛ su,
Nà-kidafaawu wuyei nɛ tɔun bɛ!
Kotoba nuiti ti ɠula eteai ʋa!
